Team Buddies (USA).name: 克里斯托弗·劳埃德
Team Buddies (USA).original_desc: One fine and sunny day in the land that Buddies roam, there was a great and mighty disco in a tent. This tent would bob up and down with the music. All of a sudden, a large, flat, grey, flying THING blocked out the sun (The Great Eclipse) and began to drop crates. These crates were filled with all sorts of goodies such as Uzis and Bazookas. Inevitably, chaos broke out and the buddies became segregated according to color.
Team Buddies (USA).desc: 在好友漫遊的土地上的一個晴朗、陽光明媚的日子，帳篷裡舉辦了一場盛大的迪斯科舞會。這個帳篷會隨著音樂上下擺動。突然，一個巨大的、扁平的、灰色的飛行物體遮住了太陽（大日食）並開始掉落板條箱。這些板條箱裡裝滿了各種好東西，例如烏茲槍和火箭筒。不可避免地，混亂爆發了，夥伴們根據膚色被隔離。

Ms. Pac-Man Maze Madness (USA) (Rev 1).name: PlayStation 2游戏列表
Ms. Pac-Man Maze Madness (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Ms. Pac-Man Maze Madness is a combination of classic Pac-Man (or in this case, Ms. Pac-Man) action, maze exploration and Sokoban-like puzzle elements. Players take on the role of Ms. Pac-Man and have to save Pac-Land once again. Although the game is in full 3D, players can only move along designated paths.

The four Wonders, mystical regions separated from the rest of Pac-Land by force fields, contains four Gems of Virtue: Generosity, Truth, Wisdom and Courage, each holding enough power to help keep Pac-Land safe from evil. However, an unknown enemy has transformed the Enchanted Castle into a haunted house, in turn starting a chain reaction of evil all around Pac-Land and the four Wonders. It is up to Ms. Pac-Man to enter the 3D designed worlds of the four Wonders and put the evil to rest for good.
Ms. Pac-Man Maze Madness (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
吃豆人女士迷宮瘋狂是經典吃豆人（或在本例中為吃豆人女士）動作、迷宮探索和推箱子式解謎元素的結合。玩家扮演吃豆人女士，必須再次拯救吃豆樂園。雖然遊戲是全3D的，但玩家只能沿著指定的路徑移動。

四大奇蹟是通過力場與太平洋大陸其他部分分開的神秘區域，包含四顆美德寶石：慷慨、真理、智慧和勇氣，每一顆都擁有足夠的力量來幫助太平洋大陸免受邪惡侵害。然而，一個未知的敵人將魔法城堡變成了鬼屋，進而在帕克樂園和四大奇蹟周圍引發了邪惡的連鎖反應。吃豆人女士將進入 3D 設計的四大奇蹟世界，永遠消滅邪惡。

Resident Evil - Director's Cut (USA).name: 惡靈古堡2：啟示錄
Resident Evil - Director's Cut (USA).original_desc:
After receiving a distress call from the Bravo Team, an elite group from S.T.A.R.S (Special Tactics And Rescue Squad) flew into the desolate Raccoon City. Apparently, the team had uncovered something concerning the Umbrella corporation -- a biotech research company. But then, without warning, the Bravo Team vanished into thin air.
 Upon landing in the small city, the members of S.T.A.R.S began to investigate. They heard some strange noises coming from the surrounding woods and realized the sounds were getting closer. Scared, they took off running and kept on until they came to a large, ominous mansion. Seeking safety they entered, locking the door behind them. Their adventure had just begun.
Resident Evil - Director's Cut (USA).desc:
接到布拉沃小隊的求救信號後，一支來自S.T.A.R.S（特別戰術救援隊）的精英小隊飛入了荒涼的浣熊市。顯然，該團隊發現了一些有關安布雷拉公司（一家生物技術研究公司）的信息。但隨後，在沒有任何警告的情況下，Bravo 團隊消失得無影無踪。
降落在小城市後，S.T.A.R.S的成員開始調查。他們聽到周圍的樹林里傳來一些奇怪的聲音，並意識到聲音越來越近了。他們害怕了，拔腿就跑，直到來到一座不祥的大宅子前。為了安全起見，他們進去了，鎖上了身後的門。他們的冒險才剛剛開始。

Harvest Moon - Back to Nature (USA).name: PocketStation
Harvest Moon - Back to Nature (USA).original_desc: As an Child you visited your Grandfather´s ranch when vacation plans fell trough. Return to the farm that holds fond childhood memories and rejuvenate it´s long neglected fields. Tend to your livestock and interact with over 50 characters. As you struggle to make the farm something your grandfather would be proud of, one nagging question remains: What ever happened to the little girl that you knew a decade ago?
Harvest Moon - Back to Nature (USA).desc: 當你還是個孩子的時候，當假期計劃失敗時，你去了祖父的牧場。回到擁有美好童年回憶的農場，讓長期被忽視的田野恢復活力。照顧你的牲畜並與 50 多個角色互動。當你努力讓農場成為讓你的祖父感到自豪的地方時，一個揮之不去的問題仍然存在：你十年前認識的那個小女孩發生了什麼？

Colony Wars - Vengeance (USA).name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Colony Wars - Vengeance (USA).original_desc:
Colony Wars: Vengeance is a space combat simulator video game developed and released by Psygnosis for the PlayStation in 1998, and sequel to the original Colony Wars, released the previous year. In it, players complete space combat missions using preselected starfighters equipped with various weapons. The game features multiple paths of missions and outcomes, depending on the player's performance.

The game retains the win-lose scenario styling of its predecessor, only now the player controls a pilot, Mertens, who has enlisted in the Colonial Navy.
Colony Wars - Vengeance (USA).desc: 2015年電子遊戲界敘述了在2015年發行的電子遊戲及電子遊戲界的重要事件。

Ghost in the Shell (USA).name: 攻殼機動隊
Ghost in the Shell (USA).original_desc: 3rd person action game based on the Ghost in the Shell original comic by Masamune Shirow rather than Mamoru Oshi's film. You take the role of a new member in Kusanagi's anti-terrorist squad and get to accomplish missions on your Fuchikoma, (a spider-like AI equiped tank) thanks to which you can jump, stick to walls and ceilings and shoot the hell out of terrorists, all from a 1st or 3rd person point of view. As the missions procede a plot starts to surface concerning a giant skyscrapper, the Aereopolis II, which will eventually be solved after 12 single player missions. Other features include a training sequence, 3D stereo sound and wide anamorphic screen mode for 16x9 TVs.
Ghost in the Shell (USA).desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Star Ocean - The Second Story (USA).name: Greatest Hits
Star Ocean - The Second Story (USA).original_desc:
Star Ocean: The Second Story is a world of magic, science, space travel and deadly demons! Enter a world where love knows no bounds, the evil is neverending and good can overcome all if the heart is just and true. Featuring three battle modes, the ability to master skills to create items and an emotional level for each of the characters, Enix has pulled out all the stops in their latest (and first) title to be brought to the North American PlayStation.
 Star Ocean: The Second Story tells the stories of Claude C. Kenni, son of Ronixis J. Kenny, and Rena Lanford, a young girl living on the planet Expel. Claude, having recently been commissioned as an Ensign in the Earth Federation, is given his first mission under the supervision of his father. This first mission is to survey the planet Milocinia, where a mysterious energy field appears. Once they arrive, they find an alien ruin, filled with mostly broken machinery. Finding a mysterious device in the center of it, Claude begins to examine it close-up, despite orders to keep away from it. As he approaches, the machine activates, teleporting him to Expel.
Star Ocean - The Second Story (USA).desc:
2022年電子遊戲產業有諸多新作發售。
根據SteamDB統計，2022年全年Steam發佈新遊戲超過一萬二千五百款。

Crash Bandicoot - Warped (USA).name: 顽皮狗
Crash Bandicoot - Warped (USA).original_desc: After defeating Dr. Neo Cortex, Crash and his sister, Coco, take a well-deserved vacation. However, their friend, Aku Aku, has a bad feeling, and as usual, he is right. Aku's evil twin, Uka Uka, was the person behind all of Dr. Cortex's schemes. Now Uka and Cortex have hatched a plot to gain control of the powerful crystals they desire. The have hired Dr. N. Tropy to create a time machine, which will allow Uka and Cortex to go back and take the crystals without interference. Take control of Crash and Coco as they travel through 30 levels across five time periods in an effort to stop Uka and Cortex. Use a motorcycle, plane, bazooka, and a baby T-rex to help Crash survive, or destroy the bad guys by using new moves like the super belly flop or the double jump. Will Crash and Coco be able to save the world? Play CRASH BANDICOOT: Warped and find out.
Crash Bandicoot - Warped (USA).desc: 擊敗 Neo Cortex 博士後，卡什和他的妹妹可可享受了當之無愧的假期。然而，他們的朋友阿庫阿庫有一種不好的預感，和往常一樣，他是對的。阿庫的邪惡雙胞胎烏卡烏卡是皮質博士所有計劃的幕後黑手。現在，烏卡和科特克斯策劃了一個陰謀，以控制他們想要的強大水晶。他們聘請了 N. Tropy 博士來製造一台時間機器，讓烏卡和科特克斯能夠不受干擾地返回並拿走水晶。控制 Crash 和 Coco，穿越 5 個時間段的 30 個關卡，努力阻止 Uka 和 Cortex。使用摩托車、飛機、火箭筒和霸王龍寶寶來幫助古惑狼生存，或者使用超級翻肚或二段跳等新動作消滅壞人。卡什和可可能夠拯救世界嗎？玩《CRASH BANDICOOT: Warped》並找出答案。

Legend of Mana (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Legend of Mana (USA).original_desc:
A twinkling consciousness became a star that sparkled in the night and banished the darkness. The Mana Goddess acquired consciousness by gazing into the light of that sun. She made Fa´Diel, a great land, but so far an empty one.

In Legend of Mana you control a hero or heroine traveling over the land of Fa’Diel. The game features a land creation system, allowing you to create new locations and story elements by placing mysterious artifacts. Those ancient artifacts are repositories of the land´s long-forgotten memories and the many events that once took place there. As the game advances, you will receive more artifacts and find out more about the land. At home you can raise pet monsters and create powerful golems, forge mighty weapons or refine musical instruments. On your adventures you can meet various interesting characters and fight against gruesome monsters.

The game is extremely non-linear in terms of gameplay. You can explore areas in any order and play through 67 related scenarios. Eventually you will resurrect the Mana Tree and discover the Legend of Mana.
Legend of Mana (USA).desc:
閃爍的意識變成了夜空中閃爍的星星，驅散了黑暗。瑪那女神通過凝視太陽的光芒而獲得了意識。她創造了法迪爾，一片偉大的土地，但迄今為止還是一片空地。

在《聖劍傳說》中，你控制一位英雄或女英雄在法迪爾的土地上旅行。遊戲設有土地創造系統，允許您通過放置神秘的文物來創造新的地點和故事元素。這些古老的文物是這片土地長期被遺忘的記憶和曾經發生在那裡的許多事件的寶庫。隨著遊戲的進展，您將獲得更多的文物並了解更多關於這片土地的信息。在家裡你可以飼養寵物怪物並創造強大的傀儡，鍛造強大的武器或精煉樂器。在你的冒險中，你會遇到各種有趣的角色，並與可怕的怪物作戰。

該遊戲在遊戲玩法方面極其非線性。您可以按任意順序探索區域並玩 67 個相關場景。最終你將復活瑪娜樹並發現瑪娜傳奇。

LSD - Dream Emulator (Japan) (Translated.name: 东脑
LSD - Dream Emulator (Japan) (Translated.original_desc:
In LSD the player navigates through a psychedelic dream world. The idea is simply to walk around and explore things in a dream environment. There are many strange environments in this world, and one way to travel through them is by foot. However, if the player bumps into walls or other objects in the game, they will be transported to another environment instantaneously through a system called "linking". Bumping into people, animals, or special objects usually results in a stranger dream.

Each dream can last up to 10 minutes, after which the player will 'wake up', when the screen fades away and the player is sent back to the game's initial menu. However, if the player falls off a cliff or into a hole in the dream, then the player will wake up immediately. There is a graph that appears at the end of each dream that keeps track of the player's state of mind; the states are Upper, Downer, Static and Dynamic, as referring to the environments and the general feel of the dream the player just went through. Past states may have effects on later dreams.
LSD - Dream Emulator (Japan) (Translated.desc:
在 LSD 中，玩家穿越一個迷幻的夢幻世界。這個想法很簡單，就是在夢想的環境中四處走動並探索事物。這個世界上有許多奇怪的環境，而穿越它們的一種方式就是步行。然而，如果玩家在遊戲中撞到牆壁或其他物體，他們將通過一個稱為“鏈接”的系統瞬間傳送到另一個環境。撞到人、動物或特殊物體通常會導致陌生的夢。

每個夢最多可以持續 10 分鐘，之後玩家將“醒來”，此時屏幕會消失，玩家將返回到遊戲的初始菜單。然而，如果玩家在夢中掉下懸崖或掉進洞裡，那麼玩家會立即醒來。每個夢的結尾都會出現一個圖表，用來記錄玩家的心理狀態；這些狀態是上、下、靜態和動態，指的是玩家剛剛經歷的夢境的環境和總體感覺。過去的狀態可能會對以後的夢產生影響。

Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.key: Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy V (USA) (Rev 1)
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.original_name: Final Fantasy Anthology : Final Fantasy V
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.name: 最終幻想系列
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.original_desc:
The Elemental Crystals...the life source of the planet. With them, gentle winds blow, the seas are active, fire burns bright, and the earth is full of life. All seems well in the world, until the wind suddenly stops, the sea begin to grow stagnant, the heat of fire becomes scarce, and the earth begins to wither. King Tycoon, sensing a premonition of evil, hurries off to check on the Wind Crystal, only to witness it destroy itself.

Meanwhile, a young traveler named Butz is camping in a field when a giant meteor strikes the planet. When he heads out to examine the meteor, he is shocked to find a young girl named Lenna, who is the princess of Tycoon, and a old man named Galuf, who is on a critical mission. Later, joined by Faris, a pirate captain, the foursome must travel the land in search of the destructor of the Crystals, and save the planet at any cost!

Final Fantasy V featured many new gameplay options and tactics, including an improved Job/Ability system (like in Final Fantasy Tactics), the return of the ATB (Active Time Battle) turn system, and all of the classic FF gameplay you've come to know and love!

Final Fantasy V was released as a stand-alone game in Japan, and again in Final Fantasy Collection. Its U.S. debut was as part of Final Fantasy Anthology. It was also later ported to the Gameboy Advance, adding 4 new Jobs, a new 30-floor dungeon, a bestiary, a music player, the ability to quick save anywhere, a few extra pieces of equipment, and a newly update translation.
Final Fantasy Anthology - Final Fantasy.desc:
元素水晶……星球的生命之源。有了它們，微風徐徐吹來，海洋活躍起來，火焰熊熊燃燒，大地充滿生機。世界上一切似乎都很好，直到風突然停止，大海開始停滯，火的熱量變得稀少，大地開始枯萎。王大亨感覺到了不祥的預感，急忙前去查看風晶，卻發現它自毀了。

與此同時，一位名叫巴茨的年輕旅行者正在田野裡露營，一顆巨大的流星襲擊了地球。當他出發去檢查流星時，他震驚地發現了一位名叫萊娜的年輕女孩，她是大亨的公主，還有一位名叫加魯夫的老人，他正在執行一項重要的任務。隨後，在海盜船長法里斯的加入下，四人必須踏上陸地尋找水晶的毀滅者，並不惜一切代價拯救地球！

《最終幻想 V》具有許多新的遊戲選項和策略，包括改進的工作/能力系統（如《最終幻想戰略版》）、ATB（主動時間戰鬥）回合系統的回歸，以及您所了解和喜愛的所有經典 FF 遊戲！

《最終幻想 V》在日本作為獨立遊戲發行，並再次以《最終幻想合集》的形式發行。它作為《最終幻想選集》的一部分在美國首次亮相。後來它也被移植到 Gameboy Advance 上，增加了 4 個新的工作、一個新的 30 層地牢、一個動物寓言、一個音樂播放器、在任何地方快速保存的能力、一些額外的設備和一個新更新的翻譯。

Crash Bandicoot 2 - Cortex Strikes Back.name: 顽皮狗
Crash Bandicoot 2 - Cortex Strikes Back.original_desc:
After his defeat, Dr. Neo Cortex discovers the crystals that keep the world in balance. However, something is wrong: some of the crystals are missing. When the planets align, the chaotic flux created by the event will destroy the world. Cortex devises a plan to save the world by creating the Cortex Vortex.
 To help him save the world Cortex recruits his nemesis, Crash Bandicoot, to help him find the crystals. Take control of Crash as he travels to exotic locales like a space station, a waterfall, and Antarctica in 34 levels of running, jumping, and spinning action.
 Advance through the levels in any order you wish thanks to the level hub system. Will Crash be able to find all of the crystals? Can Dr. Cortex be trusted or is all of this an elaborate ruse? Play CRASH BANDICOOT 2: Cortex Strikes Back and find out.
 Features:
 * 34 levels with hidden areas and bonus levels
 * New moves and combo attacks
 * New interactive characters and enemies
 * Variety of challenging puzzles and mini-games
Crash Bandicoot 2 - Cortex Strikes Back.desc:
戰敗後，尼奧·皮質博士發現了維持世界平衡的水晶。然而，有些地方出了問題：一些晶體丟失了。當行星排列時，該事件產生的混亂通量將毀滅世界。Cortex 制定了一項計劃，通過創建 Cortex Vortex 來拯救世界。
為了幫助他拯救世界，皮質招募了他的宿敵古惑狼來幫助他找到水晶。控制 Crash，在 34 個奔跑、跳躍和旋轉動作關卡中，前往空間站、瀑布和南極洲等異國他鄉。
借助關卡中心系統，您可以按照您希望的任何順序推進關卡。Crash 能找到所有水晶嗎？Cortex 博士值得信任嗎？還是這一切只是一個精心設計的詭計？玩《CRASH BANDICOOT 2: Cortex Strikes Back》並找出答案。
特點：
* 34 個帶有隱藏區域和獎勵關卡的關卡
*新動作和組合攻擊
* 新的互動角色和敵人
* 各種具有挑戰性的謎題和小遊戲

Sexy Parodius (Japan).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Sexy Parodius (Japan).original_desc:
Sexy Parodius is the fourth game in the series. As one of the members of Parodius Team, you must stop a lecherous octopus and his army from hoarding a huge treasure mound for their own no-good deeds.  Featuring several classic Parodius cast members (including sexy bunny sisters Hikaru and Akane, Takosuke the Octopus, Koitsu the stickman), newcomers, and tons of classic Parodius scenes.  Plus, there's a few "extra" surprises for those who love the trademark wackiness of the series.

This game was never released outside of Japan.
Sexy Parodius (Japan).desc:
《Sexy Parodius》是該系列的第四款遊戲。作為 Parodius Team 的成員之一，你必須阻止一隻好色的章魚和他的軍隊為了自己的壞事而囤積一個巨大的寶藏。包括幾位經典的 Parodius 演員（包括性感的兔子姐妹光和茜、章魚章魚介、火柴人小一）、新人以及大量經典的 Parodius 場景。另外，對於那些喜歡該系列標誌性古怪的人來說，還有一些“額外”的驚喜。

該遊戲從未在日本以外地區發行。

Colin McRae Rally 2.0 (Europe) (En,Fr,De.name: Codemasters
Colin McRae Rally 2.0 (Europe) (En,Fr,De.original_desc: Colin McRae Rally 2.0 is a racing video game developed and published by Codemasters for PlayStation. It is the second game in the Colin McRae Rally series. You get to race in locations around the world, over 60 stages in eight different countries. Battle your way towards winning the championship. You can choose from many real life car models, and tune them up to match the conditions! The game realistically simulates all road types, weather conditions, and the physics of car handling create an authentic rally experience. The locations and the cars are all real!
Colin McRae Rally 2.0 (Europe) (En,Fr,De.desc: 《科林·麥克雷拉力賽 2.0》是一款由 Codemasters 為 PlayStation 開發和發行的賽車視頻遊戲。這是科林·麥克雷拉力賽系列賽的第二場比賽。您可以在世界各地參加比賽，包括八個不同國家的 60 多個賽段。為贏得冠軍而戰。您可以從許多現實生活中的汽車模型中進行選擇，並對其進行調整以適應條件！該遊戲真實地模擬了所有道路類型、天氣條件和汽車操控的物理原理，創造了真實的拉力體驗。地點和汽車都是真實的！

Tobal No. 1 (USA).name: 最终幻想VII
Tobal No. 1 (USA).original_desc:
Tobal No. 1 is a fighting game for the PlayStation developed by DreamFactory and published by Square in 1996. The game was DreamFactory's first release, as well as Square's first release on the CD-based console.
 Tobal No. 1 marks Square's incursion into the fighting game genre, although an adventure-like quest mode is part of the game. The game's mechanics were designed with the aid of fighter game designer Seiichi Ishii, while all the characters were designed by Akira Toriyama of Dragon Ball fame. The sequel, Tobal 2, was never released in North America and Europe.
 Packaged with both the North American and Japanese version of the game was a sampler disc featuring a pre-release demo of Final Fantasy VII and video previews of Final Fantasy Tactics, Bushido Blade, and SaGa Frontier.
 STORY:
 Tobal No. 1 takes place in the year 2027 on a fictional planet called Tobal, which has large deposits of Molmoran, an ore that can be used as an energy source. The planet's 98th tournament is held to determine who has the rights to the ore. A number of humans and aliens compete for the title. The game's plot and character backstories are only explored in the instruction manual. All of the initial eight playable characters receive the same ending.
 The game's immediately playable characters include Chuji Wu, Oliems, Epon, Hom, Fei Pusu, Mary Ivonskaya, Ill Goga, and Gren Kutz. Bosses include Nork, Mufu, and the emperor Udan. All bosses are unlockable after defeating them in Dungeon Mode except Nork. Instead, the game allows the player to select Snork (Small Nork), a pint-sized version of the very large character. There is also one secret fighter named Toriyama Robo (named for Akira Toriyama) who is unlockable if the player can complete the 30-floor Udan's Dungeon level in the quest mode. Toriyama Robo is not seen at any point in the game except at the very end of the dungeon.
 GAMEPLAY:
 Tobal No. 1 has various gameplay modes including a tournament mode, two player versus mode, practice mode, and the unique quest mode, all of which utilize the same fighting system. The game itself runs at up to a smooth 60 frames per second due to its lack of textured polygons and reduced details which gave the game a distinctive look in comparison to other fighting games at the time, such as Tekken 2. The game's controls are unique in that they allow full freedom of movement in the ring as long as the player faces the opponent. The player has the ability to dash and jump, and certain buttons execute high, medium, and low attacks for each character. Tobal No. 1 also has an intuitive grappling and blocking system, offering the player a variety of throws and counter moves.
 Perhaps the most distinctive feature of Tobal No. 1 is the "Quest Mode", which combines the game's fighting controls with three-dimensional dungeon exploration. The player must advance down a number of floors, contend with traps, and engage in fights with a variety of enemies including the game's playable characters. Several items can be found, dropped by enemies, or bought using crystals. These items can be picked up, consumed, or thrown at enemies, and include foodstuffs that can restore the player's HP or potions that have a range of effects including raising the player's maximum health or bringing it down to 1 point. There is no way to save one's progress, and dying means starting over from the beginning. Defeating certain characters in this mode unlocks them as playable characters in the game's other modes.
 Each of the eight initially playable characters can perform high, medium, and low attacks, and the game makes use of a grappling and blocking system that lets players execute a variety of throws and counterattacks.
 Features:
 Featuring such modes of play as "Tournament," "Vs.," and "Quest"
 Kick, punch, guard, jump, dash, and attack your way through the darkness of a dungeon to locate the Molmoran
 Select from 11 different characters including Emperor Udan, Nork, Hom, Epon, and Oliems
Tobal No. 1 (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA).original_desc: Set one thousand years after the events of The Silver Star, the game follows the adventure of Hiro, a young explorer and adventurer who meets Lucia, visitor from the far-away Blue Star, becoming entangled in her mission to stop Zophar, an evil, all-powerful being, from destroying the world.
Lunar 2 - Eternal Blue Complete (USA).desc: 遊戲以《銀星》事件發生一千年後為背景，講述了年輕的探險家和冒險家宏的冒險故事，他遇到了來自遙遠藍星的訪客露西亞，並陷入了阻止邪惡全能生物佐法毀滅世界的使命中。

Tomb Raider III - Adventures of Lara Cro.key: Tomb Raider III - Adventures of Lara Croft (USA) (Rev 2)
Tomb Raider III - Adventures of Lara Cro.original_name: Tomb Raider III : Adventures of Lara Croft
Tomb Raider III - Adventures of Lara Cro.name: 古墓丽影系列
Tomb Raider III - Adventures of Lara Cro.original_desc:
Lara goes in search of 4 mysterious artifacts carved into the rock of an ancient meteorite. Her new mission will take her to the depths of the Indonesian jungle, to the heart of India, to the ice of Antarctica, to the rooftops of London and to the mysterious Area 51 in Nevada. During her travels Lara will have to thwart many traps, solve new puzzles and face a horde of bloodthirsty enemies.
Find Lara for her most dazzling and perilous adventure. You will be amazed!
Tomb Raider III - Adventures of Lara Cro.desc:
勞拉開始尋找刻在古代隕石岩石上的 4 件神秘文物。她的新任務將帶她深入印度尼西亞叢林、印度腹地、南極洲冰雪、倫敦屋頂以及內華達州神秘的 51 區。在旅途中，勞拉將不得不挫敗許多陷阱，解決新的謎題並面對一群嗜血的敵人。
尋找勞拉，開始她最耀眼、最危險的冒險。你會驚訝的！

G. Darius (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
G. Darius (USA).original_desc: G-Darius revolves around a conflict between the humanoids of Amnelia and cyborg/chimera biovessels known as the "Thiima" (meant to mean simply "bringers of death"). The Thiima had been aroused by the Amnelian army's use of the weapon A.N. (All-Nothing) to annihilate the world Blazar, whom Amnelia had been at war with over jurisdiction over the moon Mahsah. Determined to protect their existence, and long ago programmed to protect the universe from just such threats as A.N., the Thiima swarmed on Amnelia. Although the armed forces were badly ravaged, Amnelian scientists and engineers were able to make use of both A.N. and reverse engineered Thiiman technology/life systems to create the Silver Hawk fighters. Ultimately, two pilots "Sameluck Raida and Lutia Feen" are chosen to perform a decisive attack on the main Thiima base: Kazumn, a satellite of the planet Darius.
G. Darius (USA).desc: G-Darius 圍繞著 Amnelia 類人生物與被稱為“Thiima”（意為簡單的“死亡使者”）的機器人/嵌合體生物容器之間的衝突展開。蒂瑪人被阿姆尼利亞軍隊使用武器 A.N. 所激怒。（全無）消滅布拉扎世界，阿米尼莉亞一直與布拉扎世界爭奪衛星瑪赫薩的管轄權。蒂瑪決心保護自己的存在，並且很久以前就計劃保護宇宙免受 A.N. 等威脅，蒂瑪蜂擁而至阿姆尼利亞。儘管武裝部隊遭到嚴重破壞，阿姆尼利亞科學家和工程師仍然能夠利用 A.N.並對蒂曼技術/生命系統進行逆向工程以製造銀鷹戰鬥機。最終，兩名飛行員“Sameluck Raida 和 Lutia Feen”被選中對 Thiima 主要基地：大流士行星的衛星 Kazumn 進行決定性攻擊。

Mega Man X4 (USA).name: 2025年遊戲大獎
Mega Man X4 (USA).original_desc: It is the year 21XX, following years after the Doppler rebellion and the revelation of the Maverick Virus, a new global Reploid military force, apty-named Repliforce, was founded to combat the ongoing Maverick attacks and uprisings. However, humans quickly began to fear and distrust Repliforce's military power and their methods of fighting Mavericks proved to be very destructive with little disregard for human life. One day, the floating city Sky Lagoon was under attack by Mavericks and Repliforce arrived on the scene after the city has crash landed on the ground, where one of their leaders, Colonel, was being ordered by the Maverick Hunters X and Zero to lower his weapons for questioning as suspects for the incident. Out of pride and contempt towards human government, Colonel refused to comply, and following the accusations behind the Sky Lagoon incident, the Repliforce General decided stage a coup d'état, seeking to create a new utopia just for Reploids. Repliforce were then labeled as Mavericks by the government, thus the Maverick Hunters must fight against their former allies and stop their coup.
Mega Man X4 (USA).desc: 這是 21XX 年，在多普勒叛亂和特立獨行者病毒曝光數年後，一支新的全球 Reploid 軍事力量（恰當地命名為 Repliforce）成立，以對抗正在進行的特立獨行者襲擊和起義。然而，人類很快開始害怕和不信任 Repliforce 的軍事力量，事實證明，他們對抗 Mavericks 的方法極具破壞性，幾乎不顧人類生命。有一天，浮空城市天空潟湖遭到小牛隊的攻擊，城市墜毀在地面後，Repliforce 趕到了現場，他們的一名領導人上校被小牛獵人 X 和零號命令放下武器接受審訊，作為事件的嫌疑人。出於對人類政府的驕傲和蔑視，上校拒絕服從，在天湖事件背後的指控之後，複製力量將軍決定發動政變，試圖為複制人創造一個新的烏托邦。Repliforce 隨後被政府標記為 Mavericks，因此 Maverick Hunters 必須與他們以前的盟友作戰並阻止他們的政變。

Sled Storm (USA).name: Greatest Hits
Sled Storm (USA).original_desc: Sled Storm is a racing game featuring snowmobiles (referred to as sleds), stunts and fourteen snow-covered courses consisting of slippery slopes, inclement weather and treacherous cliffs. Up to four players can also participate at once, making this title one of the few racing games on the PlayStation (as of 1999) to feature split-screen action with more than two players. Sled Storm also offers two forms of racing for both multi-player and solo competition: Championship and Quick Race.
Sled Storm (USA).desc: Sled Storm 是一款賽車遊戲，以雪地摩托（簡稱雪橇）、特技表演和 14 個冰雪覆蓋的賽道為特色，其中包括滑坡、惡劣天氣和險峻懸崖。最多還可以有四名玩家同時參與，這使得該遊戲成為 PlayStation 上為數不多的具有兩名以上玩家分屏動作的賽車遊戲之一（截至 1999 年）。Sled Storm 還提供兩種形式的多人比賽和單人比賽：錦標賽和快速比賽。

Street Fighter Alpha 3 (USA).name: 快打旋風ZERO
Street Fighter Alpha 3 (USA).original_desc:
Street Fighter Alpha 3, the third game in the Alpha series, has a total of 31 fighters, the most in the series so far. New characters include old favorites E. Honda, Blanka, Vega, Cammy, T. Hawk, Dee Jay, Juni and Juli. Some of the newest fighters on the block include a former Final Fight character (Cody, who has been in jail since the last Final Fight game, or so his clothing suggests), Karin Kanzuki and Rainbow Mika.

The major difference between this Alpha and the last two are the new play modes World Tour, Arcade, VS, Training and Entry.
Street Fighter Alpha 3 (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

PaRappa the Rapper (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It.name: 节奏游戏
PaRappa the Rapper (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It.original_desc:
The rapping pup, PaRappa, dreams of impressing his friend, the beautiful Sunny Funny, and going out on a date with her.  But what he lacks is confidence - help PaRappa rap his way through learning Kung Fu, a driving test, cooking and more, all in order to get the girl.  And remember - You Gotta Believe!

PaRappa the Rapper is a game based on lyrics, music and rhythm.  The game itself is very basic - each stage has a 'teacher', that PaRappa must follow.  You'll see the teacher say some lyrics, and then PaRappa must copy the teacher by pressing the appropriate buttons to repeat those lyrics back.  Rap well, and you'll be able to continue; fudge up the lyrics, and the music will start to distort and the teacher will become displeased.  Continue to mess up and you'll fail the stage.

Of course, the goal is not to copy the teacher, but instead to outperform them - you can do this by improvising in the song's gaps.  Listen to how the song goes, and improvise in time to the music; if you perform well enough, the teacher will step aside, leaving you to freestyle on your own!

The PSP version of the game is a remake of the PlayStation original.  However, it includes a few upgrades, such as a 16:9 display, sharper graphics, game sharing, multiplayer support of up to four players, and the addition of song remixes, which can be downloaded via the internet onto your Memory Stick Duo.
PaRappa the Rapper (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It.desc:
說唱小狗帕拉帕 (PaRappa) 夢想給他的朋友、美麗的桑尼·有趣 (Sunnyunny) 留下深刻印象，並與她出去約會。但他缺乏的是信心——幫助PaRappa通過學習功夫、駕駛考試、烹飪等等來說唱，所有這一切都是為了得到女孩。請記住 - 你必須相信！

PaRappa the Rapper 是一款基於歌詞、音樂和節奏的遊戲。遊戲本身非常基礎——每個階段都有一個“老師”，PaRappa 必須遵循。你會看到老師說了一些歌詞，然後 PaRappa 必須通過按下相應的按鈕來複製老師的歌詞，以重複這些歌詞。Rap 唱得好，你就能繼續；捏造歌詞，音樂就會開始失真，老師就會不高興。繼續搞砸，你就會失敗。

當然，我們的目標不是模仿老師，而是超越他們——你可以通過在歌曲的間隙即興創作來做到這一點。聆聽歌曲的節奏，並根據音樂即興創作；如果你表現得足夠好，老師就會讓到一邊，讓你自己自由泳！

該遊戲的 PSP 版本是 PlayStation 原版的重製版。然而，它包括一些升級，例如 16:9 顯示屏、更清晰的圖形、遊戲共享、最多四名玩家的多人遊戲支持，以及添加歌曲混音（可以通過互聯網將其下載到 Memory Stick Duo 上）。

Vib-Ribbon (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).name: 現代藝術博物館電子遊戲館藏列表
Vib-Ribbon (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).original_desc:
Your rabbity character, Vibri, is composed of some fairly basic geometric shapes. Vibri skips around along the eponymous vib ribbon and you have to control Vibri until the end, dodging obstacles to rack up as many points as you can.
 The game is a music/party game. Japanese band Laugh and Peace provides this game with some of it's soundtrack. The soundtrack is used to generate the game levels. By analyzing the music being played, the game creates the level you are playing in real-time and forces you to navigate that level. Then once you have mastered the songs that come with Vib Ribbon, you can then put in your own music CD's to see what wild challenges you can create.
Vib-Ribbon (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).desc:
你的兔子角色 Vibri 由一些相當基本的幾何形狀組成。Vibri 沿著同名的 vib 絲帶跳躍，你必須控制 Vibri 直到最後，躲避障礙物，盡可能多地獲得分數。
該遊戲是一款音樂/派對遊戲。日本樂隊 Laugh and Peace 為這款遊戲提供了一些配樂。配樂用於生成遊戲關卡。通過分析正在播放的音樂，遊戲會實時創建您正在玩的關卡，並迫使您瀏覽該關卡。然後，一旦您掌握了 Vib Ribbon 附帶的歌曲，您就可以放入自己的音樂 CD，看看您可以創造什麼瘋狂的挑戰。

WarGames - Defcon 1 (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
WarGames - Defcon 1 (USA).original_desc: The player gets to play as NORAD or WOPR. According to the game's cover box, the story takes place 20 years after the film: WOPR attempts to exterminate humanity and NORAD tried to stop it. During a mission the player takes control of a vehicle and can change the controls of any vehicle the team has - for example, while NORAD has heavily armored and armed tanks and aircraft, WOPR possesses exotically futuristic mechs and hovercraft. Vehicles could recharge ammo by obtaining powers. A unique feature in the game allows the player to command their team to send resupply on ammos or repair damage units. The game allows the player to command teammates to attack or follow the player's main vehicle.
WarGames - Defcon 1 (USA).desc: 玩家可以扮演 NORAD 或 WOPR 進行遊戲。根據遊戲封面，故事發生在電影 20 年後：WOPR 試圖消滅人類，而 NORAD 試圖阻止它。在執行任務期間，玩家控制一輛車輛，並可以改變團隊擁有的任何車輛的控制 - 例如，北美防空司令部擁有重型裝甲和武裝坦克和飛機，而 WOPR 擁有奇異的未來機械和氣墊船。車輛可以通過獲得能量來補充彈藥。遊戲中的一個獨特功能允許玩家命令他們的團隊發送彈藥補給或修復受損單位。遊戲允許玩家指揮隊友攻擊或跟隨玩家的主載具。

Valkyrie Profile (USA).name: PlayStation Portable游戏列表
Valkyrie Profile (USA).original_desc: In preparation for Ragnarok, the final battle between the gods, Odin has commanded Lenneth the Valkyrie to descend to the lower world and gather the souls of fallen heroes to serve as soldiers in the approaching conflict. You play as Lenneth, gathering soldiers and training them to be transferred to the battlefields of the gods.
Valkyrie Profile (USA).desc: 為了準備諸神之間的最後一戰，奧丁命令女武神倫尼斯降臨到下界，聚集陣亡英雄的靈魂，在即將到來的衝突中充當士兵。你扮演倫尼斯，召集士兵並訓練他們前往眾神的戰場。

Bushido Blade 2 (USA).name: 格鬥遊戲
Bushido Blade 2 (USA).original_desc: Two samurai families who date back over eight hundred years have been feuding ever since the Gempei War, where the Kagami family sided with the Minamoto and ensured themselves a victory over their rivals, the Sue. Over the centuries since, the two families evolved into ninja clans, but their hatred of each other never faded. Now, in the 20th century, the Shainto, descendants of the Sue, are in a position to bring vengeance on the Narukagami.
Bushido Blade 2 (USA).desc: 兩個有著八百年曆史的武士家族自源平戰爭以來一直不和，加賀美家族站在源氏一邊，並確保自己能夠戰胜對手蘇家。幾個世紀以來，兩個家族演變成了忍者氏族，但彼此之間的仇恨卻從未消退。現在，在 20 世紀，蘇家的後裔仙人有能力向鳴神報仇。

Vandal Hearts (USA).name: 铁拳6
Vandal Hearts (USA).original_desc:
Vandal Hearts is a turn-based strategy RPG. It follows a fixed plot-line with set battles, focusing more on strategic elements than adventure elements. 

The combat takes place in a series 3D grid based maps and each character in the party has a certain amount of movements they can perform each turn. As the game progresses, other characters join and leave the party and as they increase in level they can progress along different paths of development. Between each battle there is a cut scene that develops the plot using the same 3D engine as the combat (and often the same areas).

In between battles you have the opportunity to talk to people in cities as well as purchase different equipment for the up coming battles.
Vandal Hearts (USA).desc:
Vandal Hearts 是一款回合製策略角色扮演遊戲。它遵循固定的情節線和固定的戰鬥，更注重戰略元素而不是冒險元素。

戰鬥發生在一系列基於 3D 網格的地圖中，隊伍中的每個角色每回合都有一定數量的動作。隨著遊戲的進展，其他角色加入或離開隊伍，隨著等級的提高，他們可以沿著不同的發展路徑前進。每場戰鬥之間都有一個過場動畫，使用與戰鬥相同的 3D 引擎（通常是相同的區域）來發展情節。

在戰鬥之間，您有機會與城市中的人們交談，並為即將到來的戰鬥購買不同的裝備。

Ace Combat 3 - Electrosphere (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Ace Combat 3 - Electrosphere (USA).original_desc: In Ace Combat 3: Electrosphere the player takes the place of an ace fighter pilot who works for an organization called "UPEO" and has to accomplish various missions, e.g. taking out a special aircraft carrier or taking out enemy satellite systems in orbit around earth. The player can earn ratings from A to D: the higher the rating, the higher the chance that the player can acquire new kinds of planes. The game has many environments which range from normal aerial missions to stratospheric missions and even outer space missions. A special catch is that the player often has to make decisions during missions which influence the overall storyline. There is also an autopilot feature which can be used to land or reach a destination.
Ace Combat 3 - Electrosphere (USA).desc: 在《皇牌空戰 3：Electrosphere》中，玩家扮演一名王牌戰鬥機飛行員，為一個名為“UPEO”的組織工作，必須完成各種任務，例如：摧毀一艘特殊航空母艦或摧毀繞地球軌道上的敵方衛星系統。玩家可以獲得A到D的等級：等級越高，玩家獲得新型飛機的機會就越大。遊戲有很多環境，從普通的空中任務到平流層任務甚至外太空任務。一個特殊的問題是，玩家經常必須在影響整個故事情節的任務中做出決定。還有一個自動駕駛功能，可用於著陸或到達目的地。

WipEout (USA).name: 反重力赛车
WipEout (USA).original_desc:
Wipeout is a futuristic racing game set in the year 2052. Racing for one of four teams, the player competes in the F3600 Anti-Gravity Racing League on six tracks. Each team's hovercraft racer has different ratings in speed, acceleration and turning. In addition to high-speed racing, there is also shooting in the game, with different weapon pickups like rockets and mines available, useful for slowing one's opponents down. Shields can also be picked up and can block the weapons' effects.

There are championship, single race and time trial modes. Winning the championship in the regular Venom class unlocks the Rapier class, where the craft are faster and the tracks have slightly different looks.

There is also a two-player mode where two opponents can race and shoot at each other.
WipEout (USA).desc:
Wipeout 是一款以 2052 年為背景的未來賽車遊戲。玩家為四支車隊之一賽車，在 F3600 反重力賽車聯盟的 6 條賽道上進行比賽。每個團隊的氣墊船賽車手在速度、加速度和轉彎方面都有不同的評級。除了高速賽車之外，遊戲中還有射擊，可以使用火箭和地雷等不同的武器拾取，有助於減慢對手的速度。盾牌也可以拾取並可以阻擋武器的效果。

有錦標賽、單場比賽和計時賽模式。在常規毒液級別中贏得冠軍即可解鎖劍劍級別，該級別的飛船速度更快，賽道外觀也略有不同。

還有一種兩人模式，兩個對手可以比賽並互相射擊。

Rayman (USA).name: 雷射超人 起源
Rayman (USA).original_desc: Rayman to the rescue! He must free the Electoons, defeat Mr. Dark, save the Great Protoon from its mysterious kidnapper, and restore harmony to the world.
Rayman (USA).desc: 雷曼來救援！他必須釋放電子元素，擊敗黑暗先生，從神秘的綁架者手中拯救偉大的質子，並恢復世界的和諧。

Time Bokan Series - Bokan desu yo (Japan.key: Time Bokan Series - Bokan desu yo (Japan)
Time Bokan Series - Bokan desu yo (Japan.original_name: Time Bokan Series : Bokan Desu Yo
Time Bokan Series - Bokan desu yo (Japan.name: Chime Bokan系列：這是Bokan。
Time Bokan Series - Bokan desu yo (Japan.original_desc:
Time Bokan is a Japanese anime series first aired on Fuji TV from October 4, 1975 to December 25, 1976 throughout Japan every Saturday at 6:30pm, with a total of 61 30-minute episodes. It was produced by Tatsunoko Productions, who later produced a number of spinoff programs as part of the "Time Bokan Series":
 Dr. Kieda, a somewhat slightly wacky, but intelligent scientist, has finally succeeded in inventing insect-shaped all-terrain time machines called "Time Bokan". To prove its efficiency and safety, he decides to serve as the very first guinea-pig for its maiden voyage. However, by the time the machine returned, he isn't anywhere inside. The only thing that returned with it is a talking parrot, along with a large gemstone called the Dynamond, which is seemingly the most powerful and valuable jewel in the world.
 Now it is up to a search party, founded by Dr. Kieda's lab assistant Tanpei, to travel though time to find Dr. Kieda; but it seems that someone power hungry is looking for the "Dynamond"...
 In Time Bokan Bokandesuyo the player controls "The Skull Trio" (Marjo, Grocky & Walther) using different kind of vehicles, bombs and power-ups in a vertical 2d shooter game.
Time Bokan Series - Bokan desu yo (Japan.desc:
《時間Bokan》是一部日本動畫連續劇，於1975年10月4日至1976年12月25日在富士電視台首播，每週六下午6點30分在日本全國播出，共61集，每集30分鐘。它由 Tatsunoko Productions 製作，該公司後來製作了許多衍生節目，作為“Time Bokan Series”的一部分：
基達博士是一位有點古怪但聰明的科學家，他終於成功發明了名為“時間博坎”的昆蟲形狀的全地形時間機器。為了證明它的效率和安全性，他決定作為它首航的第一隻小白鼠。然而，當機器返回時，他已經不在裡面了。唯一帶回來的東西是一隻會說話的鸚鵡，還有一塊名為 Dynamond 的大寶石，這似乎是世界上最強大、最有價值的寶石。
現在，由 Kieda 博士的實驗室助理 Tanpei 組建的搜索隊需要穿越時空來尋找 Kieda 博士。但似乎有人渴望權力，正在尋找“Dynamond”......
在《Time Bokan Bokandesuyo》中，玩家在垂直 2D 射擊遊戲中控制“骷髏三人組”（Marjo、Grocky 和 Walther），使用不同類型的車輛、炸彈和能量道具。

Digimon World 3 (USA).name: 数码宝贝系列
Digimon World 3 (USA).original_desc:
Digimon World 3 is an RPG that follows the adventures of Junior and his two friends as they take part in MMORPG called Digimon Online. Upon starting, the player will select a trio of Digimon from three initial sets. Once in the world of Digimon Online however, the three friends are informed that the system is in dire need of repairs and that they'll stay until the repairs are complete.
Featuring a top-down isometric perspective, players must explore the online world and battling other "tamers" while learning more about the hackers that have invaded the game.
The 3D Battles are turn-based, and features use of items and special techniques. Keeping with the Anime on which it is based, Digimon are also able to Digivolve into more powerful creatures during battle.
As your Digimon take damage, a blast meter gradually fills. When full, it allows the creature to Blast Digivolve, imbuing it with an increase in attack level. Tamers can also merge two Digimon using the DNA Digivolve ability, which will yield an all-new Digimon who performs a powerful attack before disappearing.
Digimon World 3 (USA).desc:
《數碼寶貝世界 3》是一款角色扮演遊戲，講述了少年和他的兩個朋友參加名為《數碼寶貝 Online》的 MMORPG 的冒險故事。開始時，玩家將從三個初始組中選擇三個數碼寶貝。然而，一旦進入《數碼寶貝在線》的世界，這三個朋友就被告知系統急需維修，他們將留下來直到維修完成。
採用自上而下的等距視角，玩家必須探索在線世界並與其他“馴獸師”作戰，同時了解更多有關入侵遊戲的黑客的信息。
3D 戰鬥是回合製的，以物品和特殊技術的使用為特色。與它所基於的動漫保持一致，數碼寶貝還能夠在戰鬥中數碼進化成更強大的生物。
當你的數碼寶貝受到傷害時，爆炸計會逐漸充滿。當充滿時，它允許該生物進行爆炸數碼旋轉，使其攻擊等級提高。馴獸師還可以使用 DNA Digivolve 能力合併兩個數碼獸，這將產生一個全新的數碼獸，它在消失之前會進行強大的攻擊。

Bloody Roar (USA).name: 莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥作品名单
Bloody Roar (USA).original_desc: BLOODY ROAR pits eight fighters with unique "Spirit Animals" against each other. Don't just beat your opponents; pummel them into the ground by using combo after combo, or transforming into the character's "Spirit Animal," which might be a killer rabbit, gorilla, fox, or something else, entirely. See the moment of victory with instant replays that show the blow that put the loser down for good. Every fighter is involved in the tournament for his or her own reasons, and you can play as each of the characters to learn those reasons. With all of the action in BLOODY ROAR, the beast in you just might come out.
Bloody Roar (USA).desc: 《血色咆哮》讓八名擁有獨特“靈獸”的戰士相互對戰。不只是打敗你的對手；通過連擊將它們擊倒在地，或者轉變為角色的“精神動物”，這可能是殺手兔子、大猩猩、狐狸或其他什麼東西。通過即時重播來觀看勝利的時刻，展示讓失敗者永遠倒下的一擊。每個戰士都出於自己的原因參與錦標賽，您可以扮演每個角色來了解這些原因。通過《BLOODY ROAR》中的所有動作，您體內的野獸可能會顯露出來。

Threads of Fate (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Threads of Fate (USA).original_desc:
Threads of Fate combines the gameplay of a real-time 3d adventure with an RPG typical character-system. The game provides two different main characters and two different storylines.

The young warrior Rue embarks on a journey to revive his lost beloved guardian, Claire. Mint, who lost  her right to the throne of East Heaven Kingdom, is seeking world domination and vengeance against her younger sister. Both of them live in the same world at the same time and both of them are looking for the same powerful relic to help them achieve their goals.

On their journey both characters have to explore areas filled with challenging puzzles and unusual enemies. To solve certain mysteries or clear certain obstacles, they have to make use of special abilities. By using collected coins, Rue has the ability to shape-shift into the forms of defeated monsters, whereas Mint can learn and use a variety of powerful magical spells.
Threads of Fate (USA).desc:
《命運之線》將實時 3D 冒險遊戲與 RPG 典型角色系統相結合。遊戲提供了兩個不同的主角和兩個不同的故事情節。

年輕的戰士魯踏上了拯救他失去的摯愛守護者克萊爾的旅程。失去了東天國王位權利的敏特正在尋求統治世界並向妹妹報仇。兩人同時生活在同一個世界，都在尋找同樣強大的聖物來幫助他們實現目標。

在他們的旅程中，兩個角色都必須探索充滿挑戰性謎題和不尋常敵人的區域。為了解決某些謎團或清除某些障礙，他們必須利用特殊能力。通過使用收集到的硬幣，Rue 能夠變身為被擊敗的怪物的形態，而 Mint 則可以學習和使用各種強大的魔法咒語。

Gran Turismo (USA) (Rev 1).name: GT赛车7
Gran Turismo (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Gran Turismo puts you behind the wheel in realistic races against AI opponents, collecting cars, credits, and trophies. Arcade Mode offers free access to cars and tracks, while Simulation Mode challenges you to earn licenses, win races, and wisely invest in cars and upgrades. The more you win, the more you unlock – including bonus videos and hidden vehicles, some accessible only via cheat devices. With over 180 cars and numerous tracks, it stands as a landmark in racing games.
Gran Turismo (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 《Gran Turismo》讓你駕駛方向盤，與 AI 對手進行真實的比賽，收集汽車、積分和獎杯。街機模式可免費使用汽車和賽道，而模擬模式則要求您獲得許可證、贏得比賽並明智地投資汽車和升級。您贏得的越多，解鎖的就越多 - 包括獎勵視頻和隱藏車輛，其中一些只能通過作弊設備訪問。擁有 180 多輛賽車和眾多賽道，堪稱賽車遊戲的里程碑。

Final Fantasy VII (USA).name: Final Fantasy VII 重生
Final Fantasy VII (USA).original_desc: Set in a dystopian world, Final Fantasy VII's story centers on mercenary Cloud Strife who joins with several others to stop the megacorporation Shinra, which is draining the life of the planet to use as an energy source. As the story progresses, the situation escalates and Cloud and his allies face Sephiroth, the game's main antagonist.
Final Fantasy VII (USA).desc: 《最終幻想 VII》的故事背景設定在一個反烏托邦世界，主角是僱傭兵克勞德·斯特萊夫 (Cloud Strife)，他與其他幾人聯手阻止神羅這個巨型企業，該企業正在榨乾地球上的生命以用作能源。隨著故事的進展，局勢不斷升級，克勞德和他的盟友面對遊戲的主要對手薩菲羅斯。

Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo (USA).name: PlayStation Classic
Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo (USA).original_desc: Burst right into the feverish puzzle action that combines irresistable, addictive fun with famous Capcom characters. Beat your opponent to the punch by stacking block after block in strategic patterns and color combinations. Be the first to fill the opponent's screen with blocks and K.O. You win! But get ready for more because you can't play just once!
Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo (USA).desc: 立即投入到狂熱的解謎動作中，將不可抗拒的、令人上癮的樂趣與著名的 Capcom 角色融為一體。通過以戰略圖案和顏色組合堆疊一個又一個的方塊，擊敗你的對手。成為第一個用方塊填滿對手屏幕並擊倒對手的人。你贏了！但要準備好玩更多，因為你不能只玩一次！

Parasite Eve II (USA).name: 野村哲也
Parasite Eve II (USA).original_desc:
Aya Brea is back in a new game. This time there are fewer RPG elements than the first game, and the game plays more like Resident Evil. Battles are now in real-time, and a new range of weapons are available. Defeating enemies rewards money as well as points used to revive and power-up Aya's suppressed Parasite powers, like healing and igniting foes. Weapons and armor now have fixed stats, but attachments can be swapped in and out of them to modify their properties.

After surviving the events of Parasite Eve Aya left her job as a cop and became a member of MIST (Mitochondrion Investigation and Suppression Agency) in order to hunt down the remnant mutants spawned by Eve's awakening. In the year 2000 a new breed of Neo Mitochondrion takes over the Akropolis Tower in downtown LA. Aya is called in and uncovers a secret organization that threatens all humanity.
Parasite Eve II (USA).desc:
阿雅·布雷亞在新遊戲中回歸。這次的RPG元素比第一款遊戲少了一些，而且遊戲玩法更像是《生化危機》。戰鬥現在是實時的，並且有一系列新的武器可供使用。擊敗敵人會獎勵金錢以及積分，用於復活和增強艾雅被抑制的寄生力量，例如治療和點燃敵人。武器和盔甲現在具有固定的統計數據，但可以交換附件以修改其屬性。

在寄生蟲夏娃事件中倖存下來後，艾雅辭去了警察的工作，成為 MIST（線粒體調查和抑制機構）的成員，以追捕因夏娃覺醒而產生的殘餘變種人。2000 年，一種新型新線粒體佔據了洛杉磯市中心的 Akropolis 塔。艾雅被召喚過來，揭露了一個威脅全人類的秘密組織。

Front Mission 3 (USA).name: 史克威尔艾尼克斯电子游戏列表
Front Mission 3 (USA).original_desc:
Front Mission 3 is the third main entry and the fifth entry overall in the Front Mission series. Like other Front Mission titles, Front Mission 3 is part of a serialized storyline that follows the stories of various characters and their struggles involving mecha known as wanzers.
While it is a tactical role-playing game, there is a stronger emphasis on role-playing elements as opposed to strategic elements in Front Mission 3. The game progresses in a linear manner: watch cut-scene events, complete missions, set up wanzers during intermissions, and sortie for the next mission. The player travels to locations on a world map. As the player progresses through the plot, new locations are revealed on the world map. Towns and cities act as intermission points where the player can organize and set up their units for the upcoming mission. New to Front Mission 3 is the Double Feature Scenario - this allows the player to experience two different scenarios that exist independently of one another within the game's storyline. In other words, the player can play through two stories; while they may share common events and environments, the stories are largely unique and in essence are fully-fledged games.
Front Mission 3 (USA).desc:
《前線任務 3》是《前線任務》系列的第三部主要作品，也是第五部作品。與其他《前線任務》遊戲一樣，《前線任務 3》是系列故事情節的一部分，講述了各種角色的故事以及他們與稱為機體的機甲的鬥爭。
雖然它是一款戰術角色扮演遊戲，但與《前線任務 3》中的戰略元素相比，它更加強調角色扮演元素。遊戲以線性方式進行：觀看過場動畫事件、完成任務、在中場休息時設置機體以及出擊下一個任務。玩家前往世界地圖上的地點。隨著玩家在劇情中前進，世界地圖上會顯示新的地點。城鎮和城市充當中場休息點，玩家可以在這里為即將到來的任務組織和設置他們的單位。《前線任務 3》的新增功能是雙功能場景 - 這允許玩家體驗遊戲故事情節中彼此獨立存在的兩種不同場景。換句話說，玩家可以玩兩個故事；雖然它們可能共享共同的事件和環境，但故事很大程度上是獨特的，本質上是成熟的遊戲。

Wild 9 (USA).name: 巫师3：狂猎
Wild 9 (USA).original_desc: Wild 9 is a 2D platformer with 3D graphics, featuring gameplay similar in vein to the company's 2D Earthworm Jim games. Unique to Wild 9 is the 'rig', a weapon your character wields to carry enemies to torture and maim them to solve puzzles and progress through the game's ten levels. Basically, it's an interesting twist and homage to more old-school Super NES video gaming.
Wild 9 (USA).desc: Wild 9 是一款具有 3D 圖形的 2D 平台遊戲，其遊戲玩法與該公司的 2D Earthworm Jim 遊戲類似。Wild 9 的獨特之處在於“裝備”，您的角色使用這種武器來折磨敵人並致殘他們，以解決謎題並在遊戲的十個關卡中取得進展。基本上，這是一個有趣的轉變，也是對老式超級紅白機視頻遊戲的致敬。

R4 - Ridge Racer Type 4 (USA).name: PocketStation
R4 - Ridge Racer Type 4 (USA).original_desc:
Powering beyond RIDGE and RAGE RACER, high-speed control and advanced dynamics accekerate the rush of a first class victory.

-In-depth Grand Prix Mode
-Incredible two-player action
-40+ unique car models with over 300 variations
-Hyper-evolved graphics for the supreme racing experience
R4 - Ridge Racer Type 4 (USA).desc:
超越 RIDGE 和 RAGE RACER 的動力，高速控制和先進的動態加速沖向一流的勝利。

-深入的大獎賽模式
- 令人難以置信的兩人動作
-40+ 獨特的汽車模型，超過 300 種變化
- 超級進化的圖形帶來至尊賽車體驗

Medal of Honor - Underground (USA).name: Greatest Hits
Medal of Honor - Underground (USA).original_desc:
The year is 1940, and the conquering force of the Third Reich has invaded France. Nazi Germany has marched into Paris and claimed the once proud nation as its own in its further quest for domination of Europe. The allied forces won't be coming to liberate France any time soon, as they have their hands full protecting Great Britain. The perception that the French have simply let Hitler walk into their country without a fight has not endeared the rest of the war-torn world to the cause.
 As a young woman named Manon Batiste, you will be thrust into the world of intrigue and violence that is World War II doing all you can to save your beloved homeland by joining the OSS and traveling the world as a member of the French Underground, taking out Gestapo thugs and the SS so that you might become a seasoned veteran and aid in the ultimate liberation of your nation.
Medal of Honor - Underground (USA).desc:
1940年，第三帝國的征服力量入侵了法國。納粹德國進軍巴黎，聲稱這個曾經自豪的國家為自己的國家，進一步尋求對歐洲的統治。盟軍不會很快來解放法國，因為他們正全力保護英國。人們認為法國人只是讓希特勒不經戰鬥就走進了他們的國家，但這並沒有讓飽受戰爭蹂躪的世界其他國家對這一事業產生好感。
作為一名名叫曼農·巴蒂斯特的年輕女子，你將被推入第二次世界大戰的陰謀和暴力世界，加入戰略情報局，以法國地下組織成員的身份環遊世界，消滅蓋世太保暴徒和黨衛軍，竭盡全力拯救你深愛的家園，從而成為一名經驗豐富的老兵，為國家的最終解放提供幫助。

Die Hard Trilogy (USA).name: 終極警探
Die Hard Trilogy (USA).original_desc:
Die Hard Trilogy is split into three games, each game representing one of the movies, obviously.  

Die Hard 1 is a third person shooter in a style similar to Tomb Raider.  You are John McClane and must fight through twenty floors of terrorists in the Nakatomi Plaza.  The game has an invisible wall effect which allows you to see John even in small hallways.

Die Hard 2 is a first person rail shooter in the vein of Virtua Cop or Mad Dog McCree.  Once again you take the role of John  McClane firing upon terrorists who happen to be ransacking the Washington/Dulles Airport in search of a South American dictator and druglord.

Die Hard 3 is a fast-paced taxi racer through the city.  John must this time speed through New York City defusing bombs and ramming evildoers off the road behind the wheel of a cab.
Die Hard Trilogy (USA).desc:
虎膽龍威三部曲分為三款遊戲，顯然，每款遊戲代表一部電影。

《虎膽龍威 1》是一款類似於《古墓麗影》風格的第三人稱射擊遊戲。你是約翰·麥克萊恩，必須與中富廣場二十層樓的恐怖分子作戰。遊戲具有隱形牆壁效果，即使在狹小的走廊裡，您也能看到約翰。

《虎膽龍威 2》是一款第一人稱鐵路射擊遊戲，具有 Virtua Cop 或 Mad Dog McCree 的風格。你再次扮演約翰·麥克萊恩的角色，向恰好洗劫華盛頓/杜勒斯機場尋找南美獨裁者和毒梟的恐怖分子開槍。

《虎膽龍威 3》是一款穿越城市的快節奏出租車賽車遊戲。約翰這一次必須快速穿過紐約市，拆除炸彈，並駕駛出租車將壞人趕出道路。

Mr. Driller G (Japan).name: 万代南梦宫电子游戏系列列表
Mr. Driller G (Japan).original_desc: 'Action' The Driller family! 4 people, 1 animal and 1 machine give a great show around the world and universe. And what is the uproar this time!?nnThis great title packs the fun of the drilling action series 'Mr. Driller', in which you have to collect air capsules as you evade falling blocks and aim for the underground goal.
Mr. Driller G (Japan).desc: 鑽探家族‘行動’！4 個人、1 只動物和 1 台機器在世界和宇宙中進行精彩表演。這次到底是怎麼引起軒然大波的！ ？這個偉大的標題包含了鑽井動作系列“Mr.”的樂趣。鑽探者，你必須在躲避掉落的方塊並瞄準地下目標時收集空氣囊。

R-Type Delta (USA).name: R-Type Delta
R-Type Delta (USA).original_desc:
The Bydo Empire has returned to Earth with a vengeance. This time, they will not accept defeat so easily. Earth however, is ready for them...

Three R-Class ships: the R-9, the R-13, and the prototype R-X, are your weapons in this war. Choose your ship according to your liking, blast off, and strike the Bydo Empire!

R-Type Delta is the first 2D/3D R-Type game (a la Einhander and Thunder Force V) and is a PlayStation exclusive.
R-Type Delta (USA).desc:
拜多帝國帶著復仇之心重返地球。這一次，他們不會那麼輕易認輸。然而，地球已經為他們做好了準備……

三艘 R 級艦艇：R-9、R-13 和原型 R-X，是您在這場戰爭中的武器。根據你的喜好選擇你的戰艦，起飛，攻擊拜多帝國！

R-Type Delta 是首款 2D/3D R-Type 遊戲（類似於 Einhander 和 Thunder Force V），並且是 PlayStation 獨占遊戲。

CTR - Crash Team Racing (USA).name: 顽皮狗
CTR - Crash Team Racing (USA).original_desc: It's a multi-player kart racing game starring your favorite bandicoot CRASH and a host of his friends...and foes! The stakes are high and the competition is fierce. Ready...Set...GO!!!
CTR - Crash Team Racing (USA).desc: 這是一款多人卡丁車賽車遊戲，主角是你最喜歡的袋狸 CRASH 和他的一群朋友……還有敵人！風險很高，競爭也很激烈。準備好...設置...出發！ ！ ！

WipEout 3 - Special Edition (Europe) (En.name: Wii U遊戲列表
WipEout 3 - Special Edition (Europe) (En.original_desc:
Wipeout 3: Special Edition was released exclusively in Europe on 14th July 2000. It features many minor changes to gameplay, such as different craft physics, auto-loading of saves, unlock messages and AI bugfixes. Special Edition also adds eight courses from previous Wipeout titles (three from Wipeout and five from Wipeout 2097) plus two hidden prototype circuits previously only available in the Japanese version of Wipeout 3, giving total of 22 tracks compared to just 12 in the standard edition.

Wipeout 3: Special Edition also allows for four-person multiplayer, using two televisions and two PlayStation consoles connected with the PlayStation Link Cable. Wipeout 3: Special Edition was the last game in the Wipeout series made for the PlayStation.
WipEout 3 - Special Edition (Europe) (En.desc:
Wipeout 3：特別版於 2000 年 7 月 14 日在歐洲獨家發行。它對遊戲玩法進行了許多細微的更改，例如不同的工藝物理、自動加載保存、解鎖消息和 AI 錯誤修復。特別版還添加了之前 Wipeout 遊戲中的 8 條賽道（其中 3 條來自 Wipeout，5 條來自 Wipeout 2097），另外還有兩條隱藏的原型電路，此前僅在日版 Wipeout 3 中提供，總共 22 條賽道，而標準版中只有 12 條。

Wipeout 3：特別版還允許四人多人遊戲，使用兩台電視和兩台通過 PlayStation Link 電纜連接的 PlayStation 遊戲機。《Wipeout 3：特別版》是為 PlayStation 製作的 Wipeout 系列的最後一款遊戲。

Castlevania - Symphony of the Night (USA.name: 恶魔城系列
Castlevania - Symphony of the Night (USA.original_desc: As a descendant of Dracula, you must end the vampire bloodline. Can you rid the world of this unspeakable terror? Uncover the mystery of Castlevania and challenge an adventure as legendary as its name. Over 140 different enemies, bosses, and ghastly creatures. Awesome magical spells - transform into a bat, a wolf, or etheral mist. Hidden weapons, secrets, and characters...the largest Castlevania ever!
Castlevania - Symphony of the Night (USA.desc: 作為德古拉的後裔，你必須終結吸血鬼血統。你能把這個無法形容的恐怖現像從世界上除掉嗎？揭開惡魔城的神秘面紗，挑戰像它的名字一樣傳奇的冒險。超過 140 種不同的敵人、頭目和可怕的生物。令人敬畏的魔法咒語 - 變成蝙蝠、狼或飄渺的薄霧。隱藏武器、秘密和角色……有史以來最大的惡魔城！

Gauntlet Legends (USA).name: 艾薇·瓦倫汀
Gauntlet Legends (USA).original_desc:
"Wizard is about to die."
 Wait just a minute -- we all know that good wizards never die, they just teleport to another dimension! Such is the case with Gauntlet Legends, the 1998 Arcade update to the original 1985 coin-op game that featured four-player simultaneous action set within a fantasy setting. The four character classes (warrior, wizard, valkyrie and archer) have returned in full 3D, but this time they have a few friends! Yet before you can use the new characters, you'll have to first find them during the course of play.
Gauntlet Legends (USA).desc:
“巫師快要死了。”
等一下——我們都知道優秀的巫師永遠不會死，他們只是傳送到另一個維度！《Gauntlet Legends》就是這樣的例子，它是 1998 年街機遊戲對 1985 年原版投幣遊戲的更新，其特點是在奇幻背景下進行四人同時行動。四個角色類別（戰士、巫師、女武神和弓箭手）以全 3D 形式回歸，但這次他們有一些朋友！然而，在使用新角色之前，您必須首先在遊戲過程中找到它們。

YoYo's Puzzle Park (Europe).name: PlayStation游戏列表
YoYo's Puzzle Park (Europe).original_desc:
YoYo's Puzzle Park is a puzzle platform game for the PlayStation.

At the opening ceremony of the Gussan Paradise theme park, a creature known as YoYo invades it. He takes hostages from the crowd and manages to elude the police and take control of the park. It's up to Guss and Yodie, two innocent bystanders, to take back the park.

The game features some sixty platform filled levels similar to Bubble Bobble. The player (as Guss or Yodie) can hop around on them, while avoiding the enemies that crowd the platforms. The enemies hurt the player by touching them, and some have ranged attacks like lasers. The players can strike back at the enemies with bombs that scatter the level, throwing or jumping on them activates their two second fuse. The goal is to kill all the enemies in a level within the time limit.

To aid the protagonists there are several collectibles such as vehicles. Guss and Yodie can also stun enemies with their Yo-yos.

In the multi-player mode, you can fight against your friends in a two player deathmatch game.
YoYo's Puzzle Park (Europe).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼PlayStation 2的電子遊戲。

Blood Omen - Legacy of Kain (USA).name: 晶体动力电子游戏列表
Blood Omen - Legacy of Kain (USA).original_desc: Blood Omen is a top-down game where the player controls the vampiric Kain. As a vampire, Kain is able to withstand sunlight, but is harmed by water. However, he is able to obtain several cursed abilities and spells such as being able to transform into a bat, wolf and even a cloud mist respectively, as well as learning the ability to disguise himself from creatures of weaker mind. Kain is also fixated on murder and is a master of several ways to kill and destroy his opponents. As the enemies are slain in front of him, Kain may drink their blood to restore his health, which is always trickling away, representative of his insatiable craving. To aid in the slaughter of his enemies, Kain may equip different weapons and armor, each with its own unique properties.
Blood Omen - Legacy of Kain (USA).desc: 《血兆》是一款自上而下的遊戲，玩家控制吸血鬼凱恩。作為吸血鬼，凱恩能夠承受陽光，但會受到水的傷害。然而，他卻能夠獲得一些被詛咒的能力和咒語，例如能夠分別變成蝙蝠、狼甚至雲霧，以及從心智較弱的生物那裡學會偽裝自己的能力。凱恩還熱衷於謀殺，並且精通多種殺死和摧毀對手的方法。當敵人在他面前被殺時，凱恩可以喝他們的血來恢復他的生命值，而生命值總是在慢慢流失，代表著他永不滿足的渴望。為了幫助屠殺敵人，凱恩可能會裝備不同的武器和盔甲，每種武器和盔甲都有其獨特的屬性。

Vandal Hearts II (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Vandal Hearts II (USA).original_desc:
Vandal Hearts II is a turn based strategic RPG which is comparable to the more famous Fire Emblem series.

Most of the gameplay consists of moving your party on 3D grid based maps in a way that will give you a strategic advantage over your enemies. The main difference between Vandal Hearts II and its predecessor is the change of the battle system. Unlike in Vandal Hearts you and your enemies issue the commands at the same time and then move simultaneously. That results in in completely new strategies and gives the game a unique touch.

The story takes place in the already collapsed church state of Nirvadia, that was once formed by the religious leader St Nirvath, but eventually ceased to exist, because of several conflicts between unbelievers and local rulers. Caused by a chain of coincidences, the young boy Joshua, from a small and unimportant village in the east, eventually finds himself within a complex political scheme set in motion by power-hungry aristocrats and religious fanatics.
Vandal Hearts II (USA).desc:
Vandal Hearts II 是一款回合製戰略角色扮演遊戲，可與更著名的火焰之紋章系列相媲美。

大多數遊戲玩法包括在基於 3D 網格的地圖上移動您的隊伍，從而為您提供相對於敵人的戰略優勢。Vandal Hearts II 與其前作的主要區別在於戰鬥系統的變化。與《破壞者之心》不同的是，你和你的敵人同時發出命令，然後同時移動。這會帶來全新的策略，並賦予遊戲獨特的觸感。

故事發生在已經崩潰的教會國家涅瓦迪亞（Nirvadia），該國家曾經由宗教領袖聖涅瓦斯（St Nirvath）建立，但由於不信者與當地統治者之間的多次沖突而最終不復存在。由於一連串的巧合，來自東部一個不起眼的小村莊的小男孩約書亞最終發現自己陷入了一個由渴望權力的貴族和宗教狂熱分子發起的複雜的政治陰謀之中。

Hermie Hopperhead - Scrap Panic (Japan).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Hermie Hopperhead - Scrap Panic (Japan).original_desc: Hermie Hopperhead: Scrap Panic is a 2D platformer that takes inspiration from the classic Sonic and Mario games. Hermie Hopperhead is a young city kid with weird-looking red hair that sticks out in all directions. While waiting for his girlfriend, Trish, he happens to spot an egg with arms and legs come leaping out of a nearby garbage can. The bipedal egg coaxes him to come with it, and Hermie is lead into another world called Egg World. The world's resident villain, Mad Migo, is trying to take over this world of innocent egg people. What's worse, the evil Migo has taken Hermie's girlfriend, Trish, hostage. It is now up to Hermie to put a stop to Mad Migo's plans and rescue his girlfriend.
Hermie Hopperhead - Scrap Panic (Japan).desc: Hermie Hopperhead: Scrap Panic 是一款 2D 平台遊戲，其靈感來自經典的索尼克和馬里奧遊戲。赫米·霍珀黑德是一個年輕的城市孩子，有一頭奇怪的紅頭髮，向四面八方伸出。在等待女友崔西時，他碰巧發現附近的垃圾桶裡跳出了一個長著胳膊和腿的雞蛋。雙足蛋哄騙赫米帶著它一起走，赫米被帶進了另一個世界，叫做蛋世界。世界上常駐的惡棍瘋狂米戈正試圖佔領這個由無辜蛋人組成的世界。更糟糕的是，邪惡的米戈劫持了赫米的女友崔西作為人質。現在赫米有責任阻止瘋狂米戈的計劃並營救他的女朋友。

Hogs of War (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Hogs of War (USA).original_desc: Hogs of War is a turn-based tactics video game developed by Infogrames Studios and published by Infogrames Europe. The game is set in a First World War-era where anthropomorphic pigs engage in combat. Play proceeds in a turn-based fashion, with 3D graphics, vehicles, a career-based single-player mode, and voice-over work (both narration and for characters) by British comedian Rik Mayall.
Hogs of War (USA).desc: Hogs of War 是一款由 Infogrames Studios 開發、Infogrames Europe 發行的回合製戰術視頻遊戲。遊戲背景設定在第一次世界大戰時期，擬人化的豬參與戰鬥。遊戲以回合製方式進行，包括 3D 圖形、車輛、基於職業的單人遊戲模式以及英國喜劇演員 Rik Mayall 的配音工作（包括旁白和角色）。

Digimon World 2 (USA).name: 数码宝贝系列
Digimon World 2 (USA).original_desc: Digimon World 2the second game in the Digimon World series brings us to an all-new world in which we must raise digimon to fight off the evil trying to invade. In the previous Digimon World, you played as a young boy who was called to the Digital World in order to save the digimon from a terrible fate and had a partner digimon which needed your care. In this second game, your role is that of a new Guard Tamer who's destined to protect the Digital city, and the Digital world. Now you can fight in all new 3-on-3 battles. There is now a way for you to raise your digimon party to higher levels, and digivolve them to the new 'mega' level, unseen in the previous game (where 'ultimate' level was the limit). The new DNA-Digivolving gives you even further ways to gain new and more powerful digimon.
Digimon World 2 (USA).desc: 《數碼寶貝世界2》是《數碼寶貝世界》系列的第二款遊戲，將我們帶入一個全新的世界，在這個世界中，我們必須培養數碼寶貝來對抗試圖入侵的邪惡勢力。在之前的《數碼寶貝世界》中，你扮演一個小男孩，為了拯救數碼寶貝免受可怕的命運而被召喚到數碼世界，並有一個需要你照顧的伙伴數碼寶貝。在第二款遊戲中，您的角色是一名新的守衛馴獸師，注定要保護數字城市和數字世界。現在您可以參加所有新的 3 對 3 戰鬥。現在有一種方法可以讓你將你的數碼寶貝隊伍提升到更高的等級，並將它們數碼進化到新的“超級”等級，這在前一款遊戲中是看不到的（其中“終極”等級是極限）。新的 DNA-Digivolving 為您提供了獲得新的、更強大的數碼寶貝的更多方法。

Rhapsody - A Musical Adventure (USA).name: 爆紅音樂影片列表
Rhapsody - A Musical Adventure (USA).original_desc: Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure is a tactical role-playing game for the PlayStation from Atlus USA and Nippon Ichi Software, the creators of Disgaea, and is part of the Marl Kingdom series. Rhapsody, along with its sequels, are considered musical RPGs, meaning in place of FMV cutscenes, there are musical numbers, complete with vocals. The game is also known for its "overwhelming cuteness" and low level of difficulty. Although this may make the game seem geared towards a younger audience, in Japan, the game and series in general has seen much success.
Rhapsody - A Musical Adventure (USA).desc: Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure 是一款 PlayStation 戰術角色扮演遊戲，由 Atlus USA 和 Nippon Ichi Software（Disgaea 的創作者）共同製作，屬於 Marl Kingdom 系列的一部分。Rhapsody 及其續集被認為是音樂角色扮演遊戲，這意味著取代 FMV 過場動畫的是帶有人聲的音樂片段。該遊戲還以其“超可愛”和低難度而聞名。儘管這可能會讓遊戲看起來更適合年輕玩家，但在日本，遊戲和系列總體上取得了很大的成功。

Tail Concerto (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Tail Concerto (USA).original_desc:
Tail Concerto is an anime anthropomorphic / furry 3d platform adventure. You play as the character Waffle Ryebread, a police office as you track down and try to arrest the black cat gang.

You travel in a mech and can travel between the different lands in an airship. You interact with the townsfolk gathering clues and frequently battling the black cat gang (capturing the kittens).

The game also features anime cut scenes, and voice dialog during important events. This game has a similar feel to the games Mega Man Legends and The Misadventures of Tron Bonne.
Tail Concerto (USA).desc:
《尾巴協奏曲》是一款動漫擬人/毛茸茸的 3D 平台冒險遊戲。你扮演Waffle Ryebread這個角色，在警察局追查並試圖逮捕黑貓團伙。

你乘坐機甲旅行，也可以乘坐飛艇在不同的土地之間旅行。你與鎮民互動，收集線索，並經常與黑貓團伙作戰（捕獲小貓）。

遊戲還具有動畫過場動畫以及重要事件期間的語音對話。該遊戲與《Mega Man Legends》和《Tron Bonne 的不幸冒險》遊戲有相似的感覺。

Jumping Flash! 2 (USA).name: PocketStation
Jumping Flash! 2 (USA).original_desc:
After being defeated by the good-natured Robbit, the diabolical Baron Aloha has retreated to his private island, Little Muu. Along with his army of MuuMuu creatures, he figured he was finally safe from his arch-nemesis. He figured wrong...
 One day, Baron was visited by the planet-sized monster known as Kaptain Kabuki. This behemoth roams the galaxies and bottles up planets for his collection; kind of like ships-in-a-bottle. Baron may be an evil bad guy with a chemical imbalance, but he is no fool! He quickly got the heck out of dodge and made an ironic call for help; he called Robbit!
Jumping Flash! 2 (USA).desc:
邪惡的阿羅哈男爵被善良的羅比特打敗後，撤退到了他的私人島嶼小穆烏。和他的 MuuMuu 生物大軍一起，他認為自己終於擺脫了宿敵的威脅。他想錯了……
有一天，名叫歌舞伎船長的行星大小的怪物拜訪了男爵。這個龐然大物在星系中漫遊，並收集行星作為他的收藏品；有點像瓶中船。男爵可能是一個化學失衡的邪惡壞人，但他不是傻瓜！他很快就擺脫了躲閃，並諷刺地呼救。他叫羅比特！

Gran Turismo 2 (USA) (Simulation Mode) (.name: GT赛车7
Gran Turismo 2 (USA) (Simulation Mode) (.original_desc: Gran Turismo 2 is fundamentally based on the racing game genre. The player must maneuver an automobile to compete against artificially intelligent drivers on various race tracks. The game uses two different modes: arcade and simulation. In the arcade mode, the player can freely choose the courses and vehicles they wish to use. However, the simulation mode requires the player to earn driver's licenses, pay for vehicles, and earn trophies in order to unlock new courses. Gran Turismo 2 features nearly 650 automobiles and 27 racing tracks.
Gran Turismo 2 (USA) (Simulation Mode) (.desc: Gran Turismo 2 基本上是基於賽車遊戲類型。玩家必須操縱汽車在各種賽道上與人工智能駕駛員競爭。遊戲使用兩種不同的模式：街機和模擬。在街機模式中，玩家可以自由選擇他們想要使用的路線和車輛。然而，模擬模式要求玩家獲得駕駛執照、支付車輛費用並贏得獎杯才能解鎖新課程。Gran Turismo 2 擁有近 650 輛汽車和 27 條賽道。

Xenogears (USA).name: 畅销任天堂64游戏列表
Xenogears (USA).original_desc:
After losing his memory, Fei Fong Wong found himself in the small town of Lahan. Because he couldn't remember who he really was or where he came from, he decided to stay there and teach martial arts and paint -- one of his personal hobbies. After his arrival, he became friends with the various townsfolk, who in return treated him like one of their own. Still, who he was and what happened to him in his past bothered him; he was afraid it would come back to haunt him one of these days.
			And it did. One day, an organization in control of large Gears, mechanized robots built for war purposes, came into the small town of Lahan. Fei was at the center of attention and with no hesitation jumped into a nearby Gear and started fighting back. The villagers were scared to death as he began to destroy the threatening enemies; he also aided in the destruction of the town. Enraged at the way he had handled himself, the townsfolk exiled Fei from the village with his only friend being an inventor named Citan.
Xenogears (USA).desc:
失去記憶後，黃飛鳳發現自己來到了拉漢小鎮。因為他不記得自己是誰，也不記得自己來自哪裡，所以他決定留在那裡教授武術和繪畫——這是他的個人愛好之一。到達後，他與鎮上的各個居民成為了朋友，而鎮上的居民也把他當作自己的同胞一樣對待。儘管如此，他是誰以及他過去發生的事情仍然困擾著他；他擔心有一天這件事會再次困擾他。
確實如此。有一天，一個控制大型齒輪（為戰爭目的而製造的機械化機器人）的組織來到了拉漢小鎮。孫飛成為萬眾矚目的焦點，毫不猶豫的跳上了附近的一個齒輪，開始了反擊。當他開始消滅來勢洶洶的敵人時，村民們都被嚇得半死。他還協助摧毀了這座城鎮。鎮民們對他的行事方式感到憤怒，將費逐出了村子，他唯一的朋友是一位名叫茨坦的發明家。

SaGa Frontier 2 (USA).name: 沙加系列电子游戏列表
SaGa Frontier 2 (USA).original_desc:
The sequel to  Saga Frontier, but also to the less known SNES  Romancing SaGa series, "Saga Frontier 2" allows you to play the stories of two main characters - a young prince Gustave XIII, who has been exiled from his homeland because he was unable to use the mysterious power of Anima and to become a worthy successor to the throne, and William Knights, a treasure hunter, who strives to find ancient artefacts containing great powers. Their stories are connected to each other, and each story occupies almost a lifetime: the characters grow up and die, new characters are born, etc. 

"Saga Frontier 2" continues the non-linear gameplay traditions of the SaGa series. You can visit all towns at your wish and at any time, recruit anyone to your party, and freely upgrade your party members by gaining new abilities and distributing them among your characters. You can learn magic spells by collecting artefacts, and combining them to produce more powerful types of magic. Similar to Konami's  Suikoden series, there are three types of combat: one-on-one (duel), turn-based party combat, and strategic army battles.
SaGa Frontier 2 (USA).desc:
《Saga Frontier》是《Saga Frontier》的續集，同時也是鮮為人知的 SNES Romancing SaGa 系列的續集，《Saga Frontier 2》讓您扮演兩個主角的故事：年輕的古斯塔夫十三世王子，他因無法使用阿尼瑪的神秘力量而被驅逐出祖國，無法成為當之無愧的王位繼承人；還有寶藏獵人 William Knights，他努力尋找蘊含強大力量的古代文物。他們的故事彼此相連，每個故事幾乎佔據了一生：人物成長、死亡、新人物誕生等等。

《Saga Frontier 2》延續了SaGa系列的非線性遊戲傳統。你可以根據自己的意願隨時訪問所有城鎮，招募任何人加入你的隊伍，並通過獲得新能力並將其分配給你的角色來自由升級你的隊伍成員。你可以通過收集文物來學習魔法咒語，並將它們組合起來產生更強大的魔法。與Konami的《水滸傳》系列類似，戰鬥分為三種類型：一對一（決鬥）、回合製隊伍戰鬥和戰略軍隊戰鬥。

Thunder Force V - Perfect System (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Thunder Force V - Perfect System (USA).original_desc: In a grim future where a once-benevolent alien technology has turned against humanity, only a ragtag group of ace pilots can save the Earth from total annihilation. Code name: Thunder Force! Witness the first 32-bit installment of the massively popular shooter series! Five spectacular weapons with multiple power-up levels let you blast through waves of metallic predators, and look good doing it. A constant barrage of innovative enemies keeps you intrigued while you struggle to stay alive. A speaker-imploding soundtrack has your foot tapping as your fingers are mashing. Unbelievable rendered cutscenes draw, no-DRAG you kicking and screaming into the action. Put simply, it's the ultimate hardcore gaming blast-o-rama!
Thunder Force V - Perfect System (USA).desc: 在一個嚴峻的未來，曾經仁慈的外星技術轉而反對人類，只有一群烏合之眾的王牌飛行員才能拯救地球免遭徹底毀滅。代號：雷霆之力！見證廣受歡迎的射擊遊戲系列的第一款 32 位版本！五種具有多種強化等級的壯觀武器可讓您衝破一波又一波的金屬掠食者，並且看起來很不錯。當你努力生存時，不斷湧現的創新敵人會讓你保持好奇心。揚聲器爆炸的配樂讓您的腳在敲擊，手指在搗碎。令人難以置信的渲染過場動畫引人入勝，無需拖拽您踢腿尖叫進入動作。簡而言之，這是終極硬核遊戲的爆炸！

Silhouette Mirage (USA).name: 世嘉土星游戏列表
Silhouette Mirage (USA).original_desc: In an apocalyptic future, the Edo computer has gone beserk, dividing the world's inhabitants into two mutant classes, Silhouette and Mirage. Now, the watchguard computer safety system has sent forth the Messenger of Justice to travel to Edo and repair the damage before the world is lost forever. As the Messenger, Shyna Nera Shyna, blast, beat, and bash your way through seven wild and bizarre stages using friendly parasite weapons to aid your advance against wacky enemies, huge fully-animated bosses, and devilishly difficult obstacles. Providing the utmost in playability and replayability, the game wizards at Treasure, the brilliant minds behinds such international hits as Gunstar Heroesâ„¢, Dynamite Headdyâ„¢, Mischief Makersâ„¢, and Guardian Heroesâ„¢ have come up with another sure-fire classic that pushes the 2-D capabilities of your PlayStationÂ® game console to its limit, and come up with a hit!
Silhouette Mirage (USA).desc: 在一個世界末日的未來，江戶計算機已經變得瘋狂，將世界上的居民分為兩個變種類別：剪影和幻影。現在，看守計算機安全系統已派出正義使者前往江戶，在世界永遠消失之前修復損壞。作為信使，Shyna Nera Shyna，使用友善的寄生武器，通過爆炸、擊敗和猛擊，闖過七個狂野而奇異的關卡，幫助你對抗古怪的敵人、巨大的全動畫 Boss 和極其困難的障礙。Treasure 的遊戲奇才、《Gunstar Heroes™》、《Dynamite Headaddy™》、《Mischief Makers™》和《Guardian Heroes™》等國際熱門遊戲背後的聰明才智，提供了最高的可玩性和可重玩性，推出了另一款絕對經典的遊戲，將 PlayStation® 遊戲機的 2-D 功能推向極限，並推出了一款熱門遊戲！

Syphon Filter 2 (USA).name: 往日不再
Syphon Filter 2 (USA).original_desc:
The sequel to the previous year's Syphon Filter, Syphon Filter 2 adds new features such as a two player mode, new locations, new weapons, and more.

The game compares to Goldeneye on the N64.
It's a shooter, but you must also use strategy.  You have a health meter, so it's not a "one shot and you're dead" type of game. You must complete missions, or battle it out in a deathmatch with your friends, or enemies.

The plot is about you having to prevent the sale of the Syphon Filter virus to a terrorist nation.
Syphon Filter 2 (USA).desc:
作為前一年《虹吸過濾器》的續作，《虹吸過濾器 2》增加了新功能，例如兩人模式、新地點、新武器等等。

該遊戲與 N64 上的 Goldeneye 進行比較。
這是一款射擊遊戲，但你也必須使用策略。你有一個健康表，所以這不是“一槍就死”類型的遊戲。你必須完成任務，或者與你的朋友或敵人進行死亡競賽。

劇情是關於你必須阻止虹吸過濾器病毒出售給恐怖主義國家。

Future Cop - L.A.P.D. (USA).name: 造物主泰勒
Future Cop - L.A.P.D. (USA).original_desc:
The city of Los Angeles has a few more problems than usual in 2100 A.D. You see, the future hasn't been exactly kind to urban life and now gangs have overrun the already bleak neighborhoods. Is there any hope? There is as long as you enforce the law!
 Command a powerful Tactical Assault & Combat X-1 mech walker (that can also transform into a sleek hovercraft) and battle through 12 levels, each culminating in a showdown with a large boss character. Fortunately for you, fourteen different weapons are available to help you teach "crime doesn't pay." Feeling a little lonely? If so, a friend can join the action in cooperative play!
Future Cop - L.A.P.D. (USA).desc:
SpaceX星艦（英語：SpaceX Starship，亦譯作「星舟」），是由太空科技探索公司（SpaceX）開發的一種可完全複用的重型運載火箭，於2017年9月伊隆·馬斯克首次公布。星艦投入使用後將取代獵鷹9號、獵鷹重型火箭以及飛龍號太空船等載具，執行近地軌道、地球同步軌道上的任務。除了近地軌道，星艦在軌道上加注燃料後，也可以完成地月轉移以及登陸火星的任務。
SpaceX在2012年左右開始研發火星殖民系統（MCT，即星艦前身），火箭使用的猛禽火箭發動機則在2016年開始測試。SpaceX在2018年3月開始製造BFR的首個火箭原型，隨後伊隆·馬斯克在一場發表會上宣佈了BFR的後續計畫。在發表會上馬斯克重新命名了BFR，他將第一級推進器稱為SpaceX超級重型（Super Heavy），將第二級飛船稱為SpaceX星艦飛船（Starship (spacecraft)）。SpaceX同時表示其最初期望是在2022年發射載貨版星艦去火星，然後在2024年執行載人計畫。計畫中包含了可重複使用的運載火箭以及用於支持火箭快速發射、復用的地面基礎設施，SpaceX還會研發可以在近地軌道進行在軌加注燃料的技術。作為超重型運載火箭，星艦的近地軌道回收運力可高達150公噸（330,000磅），全消耗運力高達200公噸（440,000磅）。2023年4月的SpaceX第一次星艦軌道試飛任務，使星艦超越太空發射系統，成為起飛推力最大的運載火箭，未來還將奪得土星5號最大運載能力火箭的頭銜。
這一概念名稱的演變順序為：重型運載火箭概念（BFR）2005年→火星殖民運輸器（MCT）2013年→行星際運輸系統（ITS）2016年→大獵鷹火箭（BFR）2017年→星艦（Starship）2018年
如今，SpaceX正在採用不鏽鋼來建造用於測試的一系列星艦原型，因為不鏽鋼的廉價與加工的便捷性，原型的建造變得十分迅速。SpaceX希望為原型搭建專門的生產流水線，這使得SpaceX可以在更高的頻率下進行火箭測試並快速地從中發現問題，隨後SpaceX就可以針對該問題迅速地做出改進。

Resident Evil 2 (USA).name: 惡靈古堡2：啟示錄
Resident Evil 2 (USA).original_desc:
Resident Evil 2 takes place two months after the events of the first game and is set in Raccoon City, a Midwestern mountain community whose residents have been turned into zombies by the T-virus, a biological weapon developed by the pharmaceutical company Umbrella. In their escape from the city, the two protagonists Leon S. Kennedy and Claire Redfield encounter other survivors and are confronted by William Birkin, the mutated creator of the even more powerful G-virus.
 Previously confined to an old mansion, the Umbrella corporation's legacy of fatal mutations has spilled over into nearby Raccoon City. The once peaceful town is now overrun with zombies and all manner of genetic mutations. New police recruit Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield; the sister of STARS agent Chris Redfield, find themselves in the middle of an experiment gone horribly wrong.
Resident Evil 2 (USA).desc:
網際網路特有的社會和文化現象包括的網路迷因，像是流行主題、流行語、圖像、網路爆紅短片和笑話。當這種時尚和感覺在網路上出現時，它們往往會迅速增長並變得更加普遍，因為即時通信促進了口耳相傳的傳播。
以下部分列表更側重於不受地區網際網路法律限制的網際網路現象；其他國家，例如中國或巴基斯坦，確實存在不受地區法律禁止的特定網際網路現象。 這些都包含在中國大陸網路熱點事件列表和巴基斯坦網路熱點事件列表中。

Mega Man 8 (USA).name: Greatest Hits
Mega Man 8 (USA).original_desc: Mega Man 8 (Rockman 8 Metal Heroes in Japan) begins as the robotic hero Mega Man is called to investigate a mysterious energy reading coming from a recent meteor crash on an island. Mega Man discovers that his arch nemesis Dr. Wily has beaten him there and immediately retreats with the energy source. Mega Man is charged with stopping Wily's evil plans to use the energy, as well as discover the purpose of a mysterious, alien robot found at the crashsite.
Mega Man 8 (USA).desc: 《洛克人 8》（日本版《洛克人 8 金屬英雄》）一開始，機器人英雄洛克人被召喚去調查最近在一座島嶼上發生的流星墜落事件所產生的神秘能量讀數。洛克人發現他的宿敵威利博士已經打敗了他，並立即帶著能量撤退。洛克人負責阻止威利利用能量的邪惡計劃，並查明墜機現場發現的神秘外星機器人的用途。

Resident Evil 3 - Nemesis (USA).name: 惡靈古堡2：啟示錄
Resident Evil 3 - Nemesis (USA).original_desc:
Join Jill Valentine, the heroine and amazing survivor of the notorious disaster at the mansion, as her nightmare continues. After resigning from S.T.A.R.S. Jill now prepares to head out of Raccoon City...but it's not going to be easy. Caught in a town crawling with flesh eating zombies, more than ever she must rely on brute force and cunning to find a way to escape alive. This unique adventure intricately reveals more of Umbrella Corporation's nightmarish plot and picks up just hours before the events from Resident Evil 2.

More zombies, more terror, and even more evil.
More challenging enemies that come back to life at any time.
Face off against the most terrifying mutations stalking the streets of Raccoon City.
More detailed character actions: Try the dodge move to avoid an enemy's attack.
Interact with the environment like never before: Use background objects defensively.
A unique new drama which reveals more details of Umbrella Corporation's devious activities from the Resident Evil series.
Resident Evil 3 - Nemesis (USA).desc:
加入吉爾·瓦倫丁（Jill Valentine）的行列，她是豪宅臭名昭著的災難的女英雄和驚人的倖存者，她的噩夢仍在繼續。從 S.T.A.R.S. 辭職後吉爾現在準備離開浣熊市……但這並不容易。被困在一個爬滿食肉殭屍的小鎮裡，她比以往任何時候都必須依靠蠻力和狡猾來找到生還的方法。這場獨特的冒險錯綜複雜地揭示了安布雷拉公司的噩夢情節，故事發生在《生化危機 2》事件發生前幾個小時。

更多的殭屍，更多的恐怖，甚至更多的邪惡。
更具挑戰性的敵人隨時會復活。
面對浣熊市街道上最可怕的突變。
更詳細的角色動作：嘗試閃避動作來躲避敵人的攻擊。
以前所未有的方式與環境互動：防禦性地使用背景物體。
一部獨特的新劇，揭示了《生化危機》系列中保護傘公司不正當活動的更多細節。

Gundam Battle Assault 2 (USA).name: Xbox 360游戏列表
Gundam Battle Assault 2 (USA).original_desc:
Gundam Battle Assault 2 is an one-on-one fighting game, based on the popular anime series "Mobile Suit Gundam" and its various offshoots. You can play as the titular Gundams (giant walking robots) from a wide variety of series. The game features standard fighting game mechanics, with punches, kicks and a variety of combo moves that can be executed by each Gundam. Note that the Mobile Suits aren't as mobile as humans, and thus the fighters' movements are slower and their maneuverability is worse than in most fighting games. 

The game has several playing modes, which must be unlocked by using different Mobile Suits on the various difficulty levels. The available modes are: street mode, story mode, versus (a single duel where you can choose your opponent), two time attack modes (where you must defeat either 8 regular enemies or 4 boss enemies as fast as possible) and survival (defeat as many enemies as possible; fight until you beat all of them, or until one of them beats you.)
Gundam Battle Assault 2 (USA).desc:
電子遊戲業2023年面世許多新電子遊戲。
根據SteamDB統計，2023年全年Steam發佈新遊戲超過一萬四千款。

X-COM - UFO Defense (USA).name: 辐射 (游戏)
X-COM - UFO Defense (USA).original_desc:
After an outbreak of UFO sightings and alien abductions, panic spread like wildfire across the globe. What exactly was happening? Have aliens come to take over Earth? Realizing the need to address the situation, delegates from the world's superpowers gathered in Geneva to decide on a plan of action.
			An agreement was reached to form a secret group to investigate this potential alien threat, and if necessary, use deadly force to stop them. This covert organization would be called the Extraterrestrial Combat unit (X-COM for short), composed of the most talented pilots, troops, scientists and engineers the world had to offer.
			X-COM: UFO Defense is based on the 1994 PC game originally developed by Mythos Games Ltd. The player assumes control of the X-COM task force, building bases and tracking various UFOs on a 3D map of Earth. Once a UFO is spotted (represented by a red cross), you must try to intercept it so that it crashes over dry land. You'll then need to send your heavily armed squad to the site, where you'll witness the downed craft and surrounding terrain from an isometric perspective.
			Moving your troops is accomplished through a point-and-click interface with each side alternating turns. Your three goals are to (1) engage the aliens face to face, (2) either stun or kill them, and (3) retrieve whatever technology or weapons you find so your scientists can replicate them. After all, you have to fight fire with fire! The PlayStation version supports both the mouse and memory card, with the latter allowing you to save the game at any point (as long as you have five blocks free).
X-COM - UFO Defense (USA).desc:
不明飛行物目擊事件和外星人綁架事件爆發後，恐慌像野火一樣席捲全球。究竟發生了什麼？外星人來佔領地球了嗎？意識到需要解決這一問題，世界超級大國的代表齊聚日內瓦，商定一項行動計劃。
雙方達成協議，組建一個秘密小組來調查這一潛在的外星威脅，並在必要時使用致命武力阻止他們。這個秘密組織被稱為外星戰鬥部隊（簡稱 X-COM），由世界上最有才華的飛行員、軍隊、科學家和工程師組成。
《X-COM：UFO Defense》基於 Mythos Games Ltd 最初開發的 1994 年 PC 遊戲。玩家控制 X-COM 特遣部隊，在地球 3D 地圖上建造基地並追踪各種 UFO。一旦發現不明飛行物（以紅十字表示），您必須嘗試攔截它，使其墜毀在乾燥的陸地上。然後，你需要派遣全副武裝的小隊前往現場，在那裡你將從等距視角目睹被擊落的飛船和周圍的地形。
移動你的部隊是通過點擊界面完成的，雙方交替輪流。你的三個目標是（1）與外星人面對面交戰，（2）擊暈或殺死他們，以及（3）取回你發現的任何技術或武器，以便你的科學家可以復制它們。畢竟，你必須以毒攻毒！PlayStation 版本支持鼠標和存儲卡，後者允許您隨時保存遊戲（只要您有五個可用塊）。

Civilization II (USA).name: 2024年遊戲大獎
Civilization II (USA).original_desc:
Re-write history with Civilization II as you lead your people to the promised land of peace and harmony with neighbouring cultures. That's one theory anyway, though what usually happens is that the Chinese whisper of international diplomacy means that the message gets distorted in transmission.
